title: Between the Scenes - Trump Fixates on Plumbing in the Midst of Impeachment
itunes:title: Between the Scenes - Trump Fixates on Plumbing in the Midst of Impeachment
description:
Trevor marvels at President Trump's ability to focus on the quality of American plumbing despite his ever-growing impeachment scandal.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
